attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scotland, Northern Ireland and Wales all have their own assemblies manned by their own people. Why not England? The English Parliament should be only manned by Englishmen and therefore MPs'  of other countries should resign their seats.

rejection.details: The 'English Parliament' referred to in the petition details does not exist.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
